subject: Introduction of Dispute Resolution Board (DRB) in all ongoing and upcoming EPC/HAM/BOT Projects.
text:
THT/Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200

NHAL National Highways Authority of India 
(Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 
-5 6, Tr-10, EITA, T fRoet-110075 
G-5 &6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 
NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Dispute Regulation & Legal Matter/2020 
No.2.1.42/2020 dated 28th August, 2020 
Sub: Introduction of Dispute Resolution Board (DRB) in all ongoing and upcoming 
EPC/HAM/BOT Projects 
It is hereby informed that the circular No. 2.1.41/2020 dated 18.08.2020 has been 
withdrawn with immediate effect. 
2. This issues with approval of the Competent Authority. 
(Amarendra Kumar) 
CGM (Coord.) 
All Officers of NHAI HQ/RO/PIU/CMU

All Members/CVO
PS to Chairman
